Key Match Events: Quinton de Kock scored 74 off 40 balls.
Tristan Stubbs contributed with late-innings hitting.
Andries Gous scored an unbeaten 80 off 47 balls for the USA.
Kagiso Rabada took key wickets including Harmeet Singh and Taylor.
Anrich Nortje dismissed Corey Anderson with a yorker.
Tabraiz Shamsi took the wicket of Shayan Jahangir.
Pre-Game Insights: USA won the toss and chose to bowl first.
Post-Match Reflections: Aidan Markram expressed satisfaction with the overall performance but noted areas for improvement.
USA captain Aaron Jones highlighted the need for more disciplined bowling.
Quinton de Kock was named player of the match and mentioned the tricky wickets and the pressure from the USA.
Praise for USA's effort from Ian Raphael Bishop.
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa's win put them at the top of Group 2 in the Super Eights.
The USA's performance sends a signal to their next Super 8 opponents, England and West Indies.
